1.content:
"Guys, wait--" you call out, running after your friends. But they seem intent on ditching you, the latest in a series of let downs on this trip. You thought you would get to know people better, maybe for once get a chance to lead your little group of friends. But it's been the same as always: Jack and Sarah spend their time fucking as loudly and publicly as possible, Jenny is barely friendly to anyone but the uninterested and cold Martin, and you're left out of the group. You'd wanted to head to an art museum to gain some culture on this debauched trip that seemed to journey from one bar to another with some strip clubs in between. The girls seemed nice enough at the strip clubs, but they just lacked something you wanted, something you couldn't define.
Chasing after your friends, you dropped your cell phone. As you did, the whole area around you seemed to shimmer.
"What the hell was that?" you wondered, picking up your phone. Your friends were too far to reach by now. Better to return to the hotel and wait, you decided. They'd come back for you soon. But as you stepped down the street, hoping to navigate the difficult side alleys of the big city, you found yourself getting lost. Checking your phone, you found the direction app pointing you towards what should be your hotel. It turned out, however, to be a large strip club.
Strange, you thought you'd been to every club in the city by now. And your friends wouldn't have missed this one: large towering neon light proclaim the name of the place--

The Secret Strip

The whole shopfront contained a myriad of signs and symbols-- some of which you couldn't make out if you tried. The more interesting words, which seemed written only to tempt you as they were placed near the symbols you did understand (and found yourself strangely drawn to, your cock stirring slightly), informed you that "all taboos" would be "honored" and the club "fulfills every wild fantasy. Something for everyone."
Not right now, you think. You knew you had to get back in touch with your friends. So you turned away, knocked your phone a bit, and headed off down alleyways towards your hotel only to end up back at The Secret Strip.
That can't be right. Off we go again, you thought, tearing back down alleyways, trying a different route, and ending up right in front of the place again. A third and a fourth attempt resulted in your return to the spot.
Just as you were about to start off again, a man came out of the club and motioned you over to him.
"What are you running away from?" he asked.
"What do you mean?"
"Can't you see what this place is? All your fantasies come true in here!"
"I have to meet my friends."
"But you can do that in here--"
"I can't escape can I?" you ask. The man shakes his head, and motions you towards the door.
"Five dollars." grumbling, you reach into your pocket and find that you have exactly five dollars left.

* * *


Entering the building, you find yourself in a dim room that seems made up only of a few chairs and tables, a small bar, and hallways shooting off in every direction. Turning around, you try to find the door from which you entered, but cannot. The man who led you in is also gone. At first, there appears to be no one with you, but after you wish for a cute girl to help you out, one taps you on the shoulders.
"Hi, I'm Amanda," says a gorgeous five foot nine red head with her long hair pulled back into a pony tail. She wears a black dress that hugs tightly to her body-- an almost see through dress. You can see hardening nipples through the fabric as she pulls you close and whispers "I know your secret desire. I want to help you achieve it."
You blush and start to say something, but she puts her hands to your lips.
"Shh, now. Here at the Secret Strip, we want only for you to live out your biggest, most secret fantasies. Let me show you some of our more popular rooms."
You can only nod, as Amanda sways away from the center of the lounge and points out a few rooms.

"This first room is the Friend & Love Secret Room. In here, any friend you have can become your lover. Or all your friends.

"This second room is the Mind Secret Room. In here, your mind can control anyone's thoughts or actions.

"This third room is the Body Change Secret Room. In here, you will have the ability to transform your body through any number of devices. You can become anyone and you can also change anyone however you want.

"This fourth room is the Family Secret Room where you can live out any desire with any family member.

"If at any time you want to combine rooms for a more fulfilling experience, you only need to think of what you want and it will be provided. Of course, if you are still looking, there are more rooms..."

info.brief_description: By accident, you find a strip club/bordello that has *everything* anyone could want.
info.description:
While on vacation with friends in the big city, you become separated from the group. Instead of staying put or asking for help, you follow the advice of your cell phone in returning to the hotel. But the cell phone fuzzed out strangely just before you started winding down side streets. Somehow you ended up in front of a large strip club called "The Secret Strip". Large neon signs announce that all are welcome and that fantasies are fulfilled within. As you try to walk away, down the street, around the corner, you only come back to the same place again. No matter how you try to run away, you keep coming back to the strip club. A man finally calls you up to the window.
"Look buddy," he says, "now that you found us, it's time to buy in. Five dollars."
Digging in your pocket, you find you have exactly the right bill and nothing else. Sighing, you hand it over.
"Good luck, kid," says the man. "You're going to get everything you want..."
